headline: Maskbunny â€“ Privacy focused email forwarder
description:
Hey HN, I'm excited to share https://maskbunny.com/ with you, a privacy focused email forwarder. I wanted something like Apple Relay that isn't tied to the Apple ecosystem. It stores only what is required to comply with local laws and regulations for up to 7 days.

I didn't want to use disposable email providers that possibly leak emails to other users. Instead Maskbunny creates persistent aliases that are unique to you and offers a similar UX to Apple Relay.

There's a free base plan with some limits, including a single forwarding destination and a couple aliases. You can upgrade to the premium plan to increase the limits.

Looking forward to read your comments, suggestions, and feedback!
